import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; function Nabvar() { const cartstate = useSelector(state => state.cartReducer) const userState = useSelector(state => state.loginUserReducer) const {currentUser} = userState return (

) } export default Nabvar
